title: Miley Cyrus beams on outing with new beau Cody Simpson as they grab coffee in LA
text:
Miley Cyrus and her boyfriend Cody Simpson continue living their best life.

The Slide Away artist, 26, and the Australian musician, 22, were snapped stopping off for beverages at Alfred Coffee in Studio City, California, after an outing in which they took to social media singing the 1997 Aqua song Barbie Girl.

The We Can't Stop singer wore a black T-shirt with denim blue shorts with knee-high black boots and a black purse off her shoulder. She rounded out the rocking ensemble with a black newsboy cap over her hair, which was braided down, a silver necklace, and multiple earrings.

Sunny day: Miley Cyrus, 26, and her boyfriend Cody Simpson, 22, were snapped stopping off for beverages at at Alfred Coffee in Studio City, California,

She had a cup of coffee in hand as she made her way out of the establishment with Simpson, who donned a long sleeve blue polo shirt with dark jeans and brown shoes. He had his short blonde 'do styled up on the autumn weekday excursion with the pop starlet.

The Wrecking Ball singer and her new love interest previously entertained their fan bases Thursday in singing the pop hit together, captioning the post, 'Rock N Roll Barbie & Ken.'

The new relationship comes after a whirlwind few months in Miley's love life, as she parted ways in August with husband Liam Hemsworth after about eight months of marriage.

She was then in a brief romance with Brody Jenner's ex Kaitlynn Carter, as they were spotted looking cozy in Lake Como, Italy on a yacht.

Stylish: The We Can't Stop singer wore a black T-shirt with denim blue shorts with knee-high black boots and a black purse off her shoulder

Changes: The relationship comes after a whirlwind few months in Miley's love life, as she parted ways in August with husband Liam Hemsworth after about eight months of marriage

Chemistry: The performers shared a laugh walking in the luxe LA neighborhood

Simpson, who was previously linked to models Gigi Hadid and Clair Wuestenberg, confirmed his relationship to the superstar to People earlier this month at an event in Los Angeles.

'I’m very happy,' he said. 'We are very, very happy … we just have a ball, yeah, and that’s the most important part of a relationship, you know?'

He cited Cyrus's creativity and drive as attractive traits, adding, 'She’s very passionate about what she does, and I’m very similar in that sense. That’s why we get along so well.'

Recharge: Miley had a cup of coffee in hand as she made her way out of the establishment

Fashionista: She rounded out the rocking ensemble with a black newsboy cap over her hair, which was braided down
description: The new relationship comes after a whirlwind few months in Miley's love life, as she parted ways in August with husband Liam Hemsworth after about eight months of marriage.
